titleStmt.title: M47 [Anon]. Holograph fragments, undated. Some pages paginated 1-3. 11p.
titleStmt.author: Virginia Woolf

publicationStmt.authority: The Estate of Virginia Woolf, administered by the Society of Authors

msIdentifier.repository: Henry W. and Albert A. Berg Collection of English and American Literature

physDesc.p: M47 [Anon]. Holograph fragments, undated. Some pages paginated 1-3. 11p.

handNote.p: Holograph writing by the documents' main hand, Virginia Woolf

correction.p: Apparent errors have been explicitly corrected in sic / corr tags, wrapped in a choice element.

interpretation.p: Names and references to places and literary works have been wrapped in rs tags which link to annotations and secondary material.

projectDesc.p: Text encoded as part of 'The Digital "Anon": A Digital Genetic Edition of Virginia Woolf's Final Essays'. This project, funded by Leverhulme Grant ECF-2022-602, seeks to construct a TEI-XML based digital edition of the drafts of 'Anon' and 'The Reader', among the final documents Woolf wrote before her death.

p.l: – thus he proves that he was word conscious, an artist,
aware of the possibilities, of the limitations of his medium.
Its He The aware that words, not paint, not music; words themselves.
He To be thus aware of language, the writer must
have a past behind him, just as the historian must, in
order to see the present moment, must set it against the past in counter [illeg.]
behind him. There must be a golden age; the
The golden age of English was to Spenser the age of
Chaucer – "Dan Chaucer, well of English undefiled"
Chaucer again – he prays: that the infusion

l.quote: of thine owne spirit which doth in me survive

l.del: It is the language he loves

del.l: It was He looked back to Chaucer –
differing from the What Spenser saw this was
then across the dumb age of church buildings, of
was the long Chaucer It was

p.l: The language of Chaucer was what he his
It was by Chaucer by through Chaucer that saw himself
his work [illeg.] the measure of his own speech.
Where the modern writer wrote a long time of
has close at hand attacks the generation which
has just gone, using them as the his taking off in the opposite direction
lane of departure, C Spenser's had no
revolt was against no particular writer, but
against the language itself, its decay, since
